Q_DESC:
To write a menu driven program in which the user has to perform operations in doubly linked list.
The MENU is supposeed to look like the below example:
1. Create List
2. Insert node - at beginning
3. Insert node - at end
4. Insert node - at N
5. Display list
0. Exit
The user is supposed to use the exact numberings as shown above.
INPUT:
1 //create list(option 1 in menu)
3 //number of elements in the list
10 //element one
20 //eleement two
30 //eleement three
5 //display list(option 5 in menu)
0 //exit(option 0 in menu)
OUTPUT:
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 10
DATA of 2 node = 20
DATA of 3 node = 30
TESTCASE_1:
1 3 10 20 30 5 0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 10
DATA of 2 node = 20
DATA of 3 node = 30
TESTCASE_2:
1 3 10 20 30 5 2 1 5 0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 10
DATA of 2 node = 20
DATA of 3 node = 30
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 1
DATA of 2 node = 10
DATA of 3 node = 20
DATA of 4 node = 30
